metadata.title: CVE-2022-3128 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The Donation Thermometer WordPress plugin before 2.1.3 does not sanitiseand escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege userssuch as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when theunfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
